alert.note: Alert for Deuel; Grant (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 3:26AM MDT until May 12 at 4:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Deuel County in northeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Grant County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 426 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Moritz, or 7 miles northeast of Clear Lake, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Gary around 430 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
